title: BARD - Courage Through Crisis
itunes:title: BARD - Courage Through Crisis
description:
Adam and Mark dive back into the recent updates in the Johnny Depp Amber Heard trial, including some news about the makeup of the jury and what it might mean for the outcome. They also review a new campaign ad from California Governor Gavin Newsom & watch a TikTok from the newly installed Disinformation Governance Board Executive Director Nina Jankowicz.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
